title: playsherbet
author: playsherbet
content: ..ROUND#1, Date 30/09/23 - 06/10/2023..GUESSING MECHANICSEnter your guess in USD before 06th October 2023 @23:59 UTCRULES AND TERMS- To participate, you need to be a Sherbet player. If you don't have an account with us yet, please register using the provided link.- Each participant can make only one prediction during the specified round.- You must have at least 50 posts on Bitcointalk before August 31st.- Once submitted, you cannot edit your post.- Three winners will be determined based on the Bitcoin price at Coinmarketcap on October 13, 2023, at 10:00 UTC.- The closest predictions will receive $150, $50, and $50, respectively, in BTC or an equivalent currency set on your account.- Rewards will be sent to your Sherbet account and withdraw-able anytime.- Sherbet management reserves the right to edit, update, or cancel this game at any time.POST FORMATCode:Sherbet username:Prediction: $xx,xxx.xx
